number-not-positive-or-null: The price must be greater than or equal to 0

account.title: Welcome to your owner space. Let's add your property together
account.subtitle: Let's start with your personal identity information.

changepasswordpage.token-expired: The link has expired, please initiate the password reset process

connectproperty.title: Consultation
connectproperty.will-delete-property: Do you really want to delete this property?
connectproperty.will-delete-applicants: Do you really want to delete this tenant(s)?
connectproperty.share-modal-description: If you want to give access to your property to an applicant, you can copy your file link and paste it into the message you will send to them.
connectproperty.share-modal-detail: The copy button will copy this link to your clipboard
connectproperty.apply-new-account: Apply by creating a DossierFacile account.
connectproperty.apply-existing-text: DossierFacile is a government startup that allows you to create your smart rental application file and share it with landlords
connectproperty.apply-new-text-1: If you don't have an account, you can create one and come back to this page later.
connectproperty.apply-new-text-2: Our application file is easy to fill out (less than 3 minutes, we promise) and it is compliant with the law and reusable for all your other visits!
connectproperty.authorize: I accept that {0}, owner located at {1}, has access to the information in my file and that of my spouse or roommate(s) if applicable. According to GDPR, I can revoke this authorization at any time.
connectproperty.not-found: The property was not found. Please check the provided link.

title.VALIDATED: Your DossierFacile has been successfully shared
title.DECLINED: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your declined file
title.INCOMPLETE: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your incomplete file
title.TO_PROCESS: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your file at the moment

subtitle.VALIDATED: The landlord now has access to all the documents you have submitted. They will contact you if they decide to proceed with your application.
subtitle.DECLINED: Our team has reviewed your file and it has been declined. Landlords can only view fully validated files. Check our comments in your messages and correct the indicated errors.
subtitle.INCOMPLETE: Your file is currently incomplete. Landlords can only view complete and validated files by our team. Complete your file now!
subtitle.TO_PROCESS: Your file is currently being processed by our team. Landlords can only view fully validated files. You will receive an email when your file has been processed.

back-to-tenant-button-text.TO_PROCESS: Check the status of your file

connectpropertyvalidate.oops-subtitle: An error occurred, please contact support.
connectpropertyvalidate.oops-create-subtitle: because you are not the initiator of the DossierFacile roommate file. Contact {0} to apply on your behalf.

propertylivingspace.living-space-subtitle: What is the living space of your property?
propertylivingspace.number-not-positive: The area must be greater than zero

propertyname.name-subtitle: Choose a name for the property (e.g., the address)

propertydiagnostic.title: Number of your Energy Performance Diagnosis (DPE)
propertydiagnostic.subtitle: Where to find this information?
propertydiagnostic.info-text: The final energy consumption can be found on page 3 of your certificate, next to the information about primary energies.
propertydiagnostic.adetail: Grade A to D: Your DPE has obtained a grade of {letter}, and the final energy consumption is below the threshold of 250 kWh/m²/year. {bold} 🎉
propertydiagnostic.adetail-bold: Your property is currently not subject to any restrictions.
propertydiagnostic.edetail: Grade E: Your DPE has obtained a grade of E, and the final energy consumption is below the threshold of 330 kWh/m²/year. {bold} France Rénov’ is your new public service for home renovation, supported by the State and local authorities, and managed by the National Agency for Housing (Anah). France Rénov’ offers you a free diagnosis to assess the possibilities of comprehensive renovation for your property by contacting the nearest France Rénov’ advisor.
propertydiagnostic.edetail-bold: Please note that the property will be prohibited from renting from January 1, 2034.
propertydiagnostic.fdetail: Grade F: Your DPE has obtained a grade of F, and the final energy consumption is below the threshold of 420 kWh/m²/year. {bold} France Rénov’ is your new public service for home renovation, supported by the State and local authorities, and managed by the National Agency for Housing (Anah). France Rénov’ offers you a free diagnosis to assess the possibilities of comprehensive renovation for your property by contacting the nearest France Rénov’ advisor.
propertydiagnostic.fdetail-bold: Please note that any rent increase has been prohibited since August 24, 2022, and the property will be prohibited from renting from January 1, 2028.
propertydiagnostic.gdetail: Grade G: Your DPE has obtained a grade of G, and the final energy consumption is below the threshold of 450 kWh/m²/year. {bold} France Rénov’ is your new public service for home renovation, supported by the State and local authorities, and managed by the National Agency for Housing (Anah). France Rénov’ offers you a free diagnosis to assess the possibilities of comprehensive renovation for your property by contacting the nearest France Rénov’ advisor.
propertydiagnostic.gdetail-bold: Please note that any rent increase has been prohibited since August 24, 2022, and the property will be prohibited from renting from January 1, 2025.
propertydiagnostic.gpdetail: Grade G+: See screenshot Your DPE has obtained a grade of G, and the final energy consumption is above the threshold of 450 kWh/m²/year. {bold} France Rénov’ is your new public service for home renovation, supported by the State and local authorities, and managed by the National Agency for Housing (Anah). France Rénov’ offers you a free diagnosis to assess the possibilities of comprehensive renovation for your property by contacting the nearest France Rénov’ advisor.
propertydiagnostic.gpdetail-bold: Please note that your property has been prohibited from renting since January 1, 2023!
propertydiagnostic.title-where: Où trouver le numéro de DPE ?
propertydiagnostic.text-where: Le numéro de votre DPE se trouve en page 1 de votre diagnostic. Il comporte 13 caractères. Sans ce numéro d'identification, le DPE n'est pas valable.
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe: Mon bien n'est pas soumis au DPE. En savoir plus.

details.title: Your Energy Performance Certificate in Detail
details.subtitle: Your property is classified {0}, which means:
details.list2: any rent increase has been prohibited since August 24, 2022
details.list3: your property will be banned from rental starting from {0}
details.france-renov-title: Have you heard of France Rénov'?
details.france-renov-text1: France Rénov’ is the public service for home renovation, supported by the State with local authorities, and led by the National Housing Agency (Anah). France Rénov’ assists you in your renovation projects: identifying necessary work, estimating financial aid, and finding qualified professionals...
details.france-renov-text2: More than 2,500 France Rénov’ advisors provide free advice and help you carry out your renovation work.
details.good-dpe: Your property is classified {0}, which means its energy consumption is less than 330 kWh/m²/year. Your property is not subject to any rent freeze or rental ban measures.

register.title: Join DossierFacile
register.accept-cgu: By checking this box and clicking "Create my account", I expressly accept the Terms of Use of DossierFacile and understand that my personal data will be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy of DossierFacile.
register.require-accept: You must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of DossierFacile to continue
register.title-register-with-email: Create an account with an email address
register.description-france-connect: FranceConnect is the solution offered by the government to secure and simplify access to online services.

signuppage.mail-sent: An email has been sent to the provided address.
signuppage.clic-to-confirm: Please click on the link sent to confirm your email address and continue your registration.
signuppage.duplicate-email: This email is already in use

validateproperty.validate-title: I Confirm the Accuracy of the Information
validateproperty.validate-subtitle: I read and check the following box to validate my application.
validateproperty.authorize: I solemnly certify the accuracy of the information regarding my property
validateproperty.property-not-valid: Your property is not valid, please complete the missing fields to submit your property
validateproperty.try-again: Please correct the errors to submit the property

landing.title: Are you letting a property? We'll check the rental files for you.
landing.subtitle1: Our teams check the accuracy and completeness of the rental documentation, before or after a visit.
landing.subtitle2: All you have to do is choose the right candidate.
landing.subtitle3: A free service offered by the Ministry of Housing.

first.title: Our rental applications are comprehensive
first.content: No more endless back and forth with applicants to obtain missing documents or wasted hours sorting rental applications.

second.title: Our rental applications are verified
second.content: Rental applications are verified by our team of human operators, assisted by automated checks using government databases.

third.title: You just have to choose the perfect candidate
third.content: Focus on what matters most. We simplify the rest. Just sign your lease!

citation.title: Join our community of 22,000 landlords.
citation.s1: "(...) thank you for your truly amazing website. I am delighted with your services that deserve to be known and recognized (...)"
citation.s2: DossierFacile "secures my rentals, and it's very dissuasive. I inform the applicants that their supporting documents will be verified!"
citation.s3: DossierFacile "has greatly facilitated our procedures in a safe manner."

add-property.title: Add Your Property
add-property.content: Provide the essential details of your property. You can add multiple properties.

invite-tenant.title: Invite Your Tenant Applicants
invite-tenant.content: Send a link to your property to your potential tenants so they can submit their rental applications.

manage-tenant.title: Receive and Centralize Rental Applications
manage-tenant.content: Find all your applicants in your account. Choose the ideal tenant for your rental.

result.title: The rental applications from your candidates are

404.title: Page not found
404.subtitle: Error 404
404.caption: This is not the web page you are lookingfor.

content.line1: If you typed the web address in the browser, make sure it is correct. The page may no longer be available.
content.line2: In this case, to continue your visit, you can check out our homepage.
content.line3: Otherwise, contact us so that we can redirect you to the right information.
